name: Golden Rush - Premium 1 year
detailed_description:
Premium access into the game for 12 months.
Premium access increases:
- prize gold by +50%;
- prestige gained in battles by +50%;
- chance of finding an artifact by +25%.
Premium is active for all heroes of the account.
about_the_game:
Premium access into the game for 12 months.
Premium access increases:
- prize gold by +50%;

short_description: Premium access into the game for 12 months.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP
  • Processor: Intel Celeron E3200 / Athlon X2 6550
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GT 6800 / ATI X1800 / Intel HD Graphics 3000
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.7
  • Processor: Intel Celeron E3200
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 3000
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux
  • Processor: Intel Celeron E3200
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GT 6800 / ATI X1800 / Intel HD Graphics 3000
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
